bibl.title: P. Berl. 9781 and the Early Reception of Demosthenes.

series.title: Bulletin of the Institute of Classical Studies [London]
BICS

bibl.note: B.K.T. VII (= M.-P.3 2511; LDAB 762). - Out of Athens - into Egypt: early Demosthenic Nachleben. - From Egypt into oblivion? Demosthenes during the early Hellenistic period. - A brief history [of the papyrus]. - Description. - The question of dating [mid-third century B.C.]. - Genre, authorship and readership. - The text. - Apparatus. - Commentary. - Language and style. - Conclusion.
